post.text: TOGETHER - we can save AMERICAN jobs, American lives, and American futures!

comment.author: Jeremy
comment.text: If you or Hilary get elected NOT one thing will change for the betterment of this once GREAT country... The path To destruction has been set and is in full swing!!

replies.author: Jalen
replies.text: I hope the American people recall and remember that Hillary Clinton is a liar Hillary Clinton is a liar Hillary Clinton is a liar Hillary Clinton is a liar Hillary Clinton is a liar Hillary Clinton is a liar

replies.author: Jeremy
replies.text: They all are!!! They do what they are told to do by their puppet masters.
